name: LOCInvoiceDetails
desc: The response to a request to fetch campaign details for a standard invoicing payment model.

items.name: billingContactEmail
items.desc: A valid email address for the LOC billing contact.

items.name: buyerEmail
items.desc: A valid email address for the LOC buyer.

items.name: clientName
items.desc: An advertiser or product. Required for agency-type accounts.

items.name: orderNumber
items.desc: A purchase order number. Required for agency-type accounts.
